snippet: Companies across the globe have long tried to attract viewers to live Internet broadcasts, with X-rated sites the only real success stories. China appears to have cracked the code.
abstract: Live interactive web entertainment is thriving new business in China, with millions tuning in nightly to watch karaoke performances, comedy skits and talk shows; shows are typically low-budget productions by amateur entertainers who work out of apartments, fitted with webcams.
lead_paragraph: Companies across the globe have long tried to attract viewers to live Internet broadcasts, with X-rated sites the only real success stories. China appears to have cracked the code.

headline.main: Lucrative Stardom in China, Using a Webcam and a Voice
headline.print_headline: Lucrative Stardom in China, Using a Webcam and a Voice
